item_category: iPhone 12 pushes everything forward with superfast 5G. A14 Bionic, the fastest chip in a smartphone. A new dual-camera system. And a beautiful Super Retina XDR display, so you can see everything in vivid detail.
review_title: Just what you would expect from Apple!

review_text: As well now IPhone are one of the best products on market I would recommend to anyone who needs a new phone
Got this last month, been long overdue an upgrade for the last 2 years and so glad I got it!

My daughter bought this phone 2-3 weeks ago, I’d purchased the same phone in blue 2 days before the purple came out I was gutted. Great features, easy to use & set up. Wouldn’t purchase anything different then an iPhone. Recommend to everyone.
I bought it recently and it’s great but doesn’t have a charger
I can for sure recomend to buy from Argos, the phone works perfectly, thank you so much!

I bought this iPhone 6 weeks ago and it took a while to get used to not having a back button like I did on my iPhone 8 Plus. I’m still finding my way round the camera. The only thing I have noticed so far is that the zoom is less than the iPhone 8 Plus.I like the Face ID feature and longer screen.I haven’t noticed any difference in the battery performance from the iPhone 8 plus.
Love the quality of camera, plus 5G, the speed is great, very happy with what I brought

I bought this product a month ago due to my last phone breaking and so far I know this product was a great option from myself due to the high quality state it is in and everything is in working order. I am so happy with my purchase I definitely recommend anybody to buy this product from Argos
Does everything an Apple phone should, seemless  change from previous phone and justvas easy to use.

I am over the moon with my 
iPhone 12. It didn't take long to get it set up and I was using it the same night.
Will be getting this for my birthday in July so the box isn’t open yet … but so far so good !

I am glad that I was able to buy an IPhone 12 from Argos as the price was a bit better than in Apple Store! Moreover, I received a lot of Nectar points. Overall, great phone and great price. Thank you Argos!

I reserved online and collected same day. All very straight forward with no problems. The phone is great, all working perfectly. Not much to say really as anyone that owns an iPhone will know they don’t really change massively between the models when you’re moving up to the next one that comes out as I did
Just upgraded from my 6SE love the camera
No power adapter included but amazing phone
Always buy iPhones. .
A great upgrade from my iphone xs max, fast and great camera
An excellent upgrade over the iPhone XR, camera is great and the purple is fantastic!
I bought two weeks ago I am happy with my iPhone 12 and thanks Argos great costumer service
Hi great product and excellent service from Argos.
My favourite phone love is
Ordered it and few hours later it arrived. Very happy

Excellent product bought for my daughter no complaints perfect working order... all components there nothing missing or tampered with brand new you can't be too careful..  excellent service overall real satisfied with the experience
Bought this for my husband and he loves it! It’s definitely better than it’s predecessors!
The purchase of the item was simple, quick and  organised.
I love my new iPhone
Great product, good price, I'm very happy with the phone.

What a Great Phone, Typical Apple Quality with a screen just the right size.
You know what you’re getting with this Phone.
What you expect from Apple - brilliant!
Very good Argos shop
Great iPhone after switching from a Samsung. Would deffo recommend
Its a great phone and i enjoy using it .
Fantastic phone So glad I went for the iPhone 12
Very excellent phone, clearly taken pictures and vedios

I love this phone, I can do loads with specially since my laptop isn’t working. Very professional phone!

Buy it don’t hesitate, I just found it difficult to choose a colour, I ended up choosing blue however I reckon go for something you don’t usually go for!
Excellent phone. My third iPhone already and cant be more pleased with the purchase.
The best and fast service I loved my first experience with Argos.
Absolutely love it! Best phone I’ve had camera is amazing!
Good phone , easy to use with face recognition. Easy to move from screen to screen with swipe up . Takes good photos.

I love this phone. It’s smart, a decent size (without being too big) and is certainly an upgrade from my previous iPhone. I have the blue colour which I think looks really smart. 

The only bad thing about it is the lack of charger. This phone comes with a USB-C cable which I didn’t have a brick for. It’s a shame because you’d expect it to be included given the price tag for the phone!
Great build quality, camera and battery life. IOS 14 is a dream. Faultless. Best iPhone I’ve ever used. Highly recommend.
I’m very happy with my new phone it’s excellent

My daughter has no faults really with it except that it doesn't come with a charger so before you buy it make sure you have a charger that fits it before hand. The camera is amazing and sound quality is great worth buying I would say and my daughter would say
Comes exactly as pictured and described! Perfect!
Great phone but too expensive
Very happy with my new phone. It was very easy to set up and has loads of great features.

Changed from iPhone 7plus what a difference this phone is brilliant just need to get used to all the new stuff on it pictures are great colour blue very nice will recommend this phone to anyone bought from Argos with 6 months to pay on my Argos card
Fast phone. Good upgrade from my old one
So easy to get up and running.
I’m definitely happy with this new phone.

Ordered from my local Argos store and phone arrived following day exactly on the time stated, easy collection well set up and organised and made you feel very safe. Well done Argos 10/10. The I phone 12 is absolutely brilliant running rings around my old I Phone 8. I would recommend this excellent phone to anyone.
Very good battery life lasts up to 2/3 days, amazing photo quality
Very good purchase,  im love it
I bought from Argos and it was good and quick   Within 24 hours I got  no it. Easy to use

If you've owned an IPhone before then like me you'll love it. All the usual features with a few upgrades. The camera is amazing. If you've never owned an iPhone. You will lose it over how good this phone really is. One bad thing they don't supply a plug for the charging cable, bit strange but will use your old one so all good.

This iPhone is better than any phone I have had before and definitely recommend it to others. As it has great camera quality as well as it’s really fast and good looking. This is a really great product!!!
Excellent phone would recommend
10/10 amazing phone. Really quick service from Argos so so happy. Glad i didn’t go to network providers or other phone retailers. Can’t recommend enough! Amazing!!!
It does exactly what it say on the description and a hole lot more.
Easy to use very fast great photos
The price of the iphone12 is not bad for a free sim phone,the only down fall is the iphone12 doesnt come with apple plug
It is a great phone good battery life and the design looks good. Would recommend
Just great phone quick easy click and collect service
This latest model has many improvements, including camera and battery life.
The product was 100% authentic and it was exactly as it was advertised! Very good qualityz
I highly recommend this product.
Easy phone purchase without any of the usual‘up selling’ associated with the High Street Phone Shops.. thanks
great price and fast
best phone on the market
Great size, not too big. Screen size is perfect for watching films on.

Good phone but there was an issue so needed to return. Argos customer service is terrible. 

Was unable to return the phone for an obvious safety fault, and they did not want to accept the device even though it was 1 day. 

There was no complaints telephone to call, and the store was not covid safe at all.
Apple I phone as expected. Still getting to grips with everything. Pleased so far.
Very quick and easy to place my order. It was available for collection same day . Very very happy
Very good phone, happy with it
Love the iPhone 12, bigger screen and better security such as Face ID, very light and love the camera, and it’s really easy to use.
Moved up from a XS to the 12, instantly you can see the screen has a greater look tonit

The iPhone 12 is by far the best iPhone ever released. It is much nicer to use than the iPhone 11 Pro I previously had. My only complaint would the lack of included headphones or a power socket as the included Lightning Cable has a USB-C connector and most people do not have the compatible power adapter. 

Build quality seems to be better than any previous iPhone.
I was so pleased with the purchased and I recommended to use argos online and also to use the pick up delivery from your nearest store it was quick and well managed
This is the best phone I have ever used. It wasn’t cheap but very good. I would 100% recommend.
Can not fault the phone friends like it to does as it says brilliant phone
Price and great service...
I love my new iPhone it’s got a big screen and is easy to use
Beautiful iphone 11 works perfect

iPhone 12 is a great phone, especially coming from a 1st gen SE. Recommend.
High Quality and superfast
Another amazing product from Apple, and with Argos click and collect amazing service! Always have good things to say about Argos especially their same day delivery! Can’t go wrong.
Lovely phone good battery
excellent and awesome

Fantastic, durable

I’m so happy with my purchase
Great what I wanted just ordered online collected next day so easy

This phone is superb, it is so fast compared to my 6s. Every app that you use opens fast and there is no buffering when using any app. Will be even better when 5G is available in my area. Really love the blue colour.
Great phone and delivered on time by Argos

So easy, picked it up from Sainsbury’s within 24hrs, love it !

This is the first blue iPhone I have had . It’s a lovely colour. 
Photos are amazing compared to the iPhone 8. Faster response time.
I am very pleased with my new iPhone 12 . It is the perfect upgrade from my previous phone and it completely satisfies all my needs .
Lovely phone. Looks and feels great. Camera is amazing compared to older models. Another superb Apple device!

I got this iPhone 12 for Christmas from my lovely family I used to have a iPhone X but now I have 12 I am happy with the quality and the photo quality definitely would recommend to anyone looking to upgrade really good iPhone

It’s an iPhone and it’s green. Not much more to say really.
I bought this for my daughters Christmas so not opened yet but I'm sure she will love it .
Great upgrade from my iPhone 6 only had it 2 weeks but seems good
Excellent payed online and picked up same day

Upgraded from an iPhone 7 and haven’t looked back. Battery life is amazing, I can get 2 days out of it with quite frequent use. Camera and display are great.
Great new phone. Excellent battery life.
Prompt & efficient order & delivery.

Not very impressed with the iPhone 12. It seems like you are getting a lot less in materials and physical substance for the money.

I’m happy sticking with my sturdy XR until someone makes a more robust device.
